org.jpac

Class DecimalMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.DecimalMapper

  • public class DecimalMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    used to map a decimal signal to another decimal signal.

    • Field Summary

      DecimalMapper() 
      DecimalMapper(Decimal source, Decimal target)

      • DecimalMapper

        public DecimalMapper(Decimal source,
             Decimal target)
        if constructed by this constructor, the DecimalMapper uses the given decimals min and max values for mapping
        Parameters:
        source - the source decimal
        target - the target decimal the source decimal is mapped to

           throws NumberOutOfRangeException
        maps a double value

        Returns:
        the mapped value
        Throws:
